UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.
The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhanced antimicrobial activity of novel synthetic peptides derived from vejovine and hadrurin.
Literature.Author: Sánchez-Vásquez L, Silva-Sanchez J, Jiménez-Vargas JM, Rodríguez-Romero A, Muñoz-Garay C, Rodríguez MC, Gurrola GB, Possani LD

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=640 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293 cells:50% Cell death=139 µM,Human COS-7 cells:50% Cell death=123 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=1.56µM),Escherichia coli 170(MIC=1.56µM),Escherichia coli 4530(MIC=>50µM),Enterobacter cloacae 2524(MIC=>50µM),Enterobacter cloacae 6780(MIC=3.12µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 913(MIC=6.25µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa 4677(MIC=>50µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=1.56-3.12µM),Streptococcus pneumoniae ATCC 49619(MIC=50µM),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=3.1-6.2µM),Plasmodium berghei(40-50% Inhibition=5µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae 1625(MIC=3.12µM)
